question: Which of the following has availed the Liberalised Remittance Scheme?
explanation: Effective 1 June 2015, under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme made available by the Reserve Bank of India, (hereinafter referred to as the Scheme/LRS) resident individuals are allowed to remit up to USD$250,000 per financial year (April-March) for any permitted current or capital account transactions.
